item.title: Admiral pushed out by Hegseth meets privately with lawmakers
item.description: Adm. Alvin Holsey, who oversees military operations in Latin America, has voiced concern about the Trump administration’s activities there.

item.title: Senate Republicans offer counter-proposal on Obamacare subsidies
item.description: The GOP plan would replace expiring ACA subsidies with a new program that directly funds health savings accounts for eligible patients
